sentences.en: Again backbend as you inhale , and as you exhale.
sentences.cn: 重复吸气展开, 呼气扭转的动作.

sentences.en: Always breathing ( inhale exhale properly ) your body can feel very relaxing.
sentences.cn: 经常清楚的吸气、吐气,身体会觉非常轻松.

sentences.en: As the lungs exhale this waste, gas is expelled into the atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 肺呼出这些废气被排到空气中。

sentences.en: As you exhale, lower your feet to your left once again.
sentences.cn: 再呼气时, 再一次放低双腿向左.

sentences.en: Chest: Take a deep breath and hold it, then exhale.
sentences.cn: 胸: 做一次深吸气, 然后,呼出.

sentences.en: Exhale and lift your chest, then fold forward over your right leg.
sentences.cn: 呼气的同时伸展胸部, 然后面朝右腿向下弯腰.

sentences.en: Exhale and lift your knees away from the floor.
sentences.cn: 呼气并提起膝部离开地板.

sentences.en: Exhale as you bend forward and rest your forehead on the floor.
sentences.cn: 吸气时,向前伸屈,将额头放在地上休息.

sentences.en: Hold your breath for a moment and exhale.
sentences.cn: 屏住呼吸片刻，然后呼气。

sentences.en: Inhale cold , exhale warm . inhale hatred, exhale love. what goes around, comes around?
sentences.cn: 我们吸入的是冷气,呼出的是热气,吸入的是恨, 呼出的是爱. 我们种善因, 结善缘,得善果.

sentences.en: Inhale while rocking backwards and exhale while returning forward.
sentences.cn: 向后摇动时吸气和返回呼气.

sentences.en: It's better to exhale prior to crossing the event horizon.
sentences.cn: 在通过这个界面前最好先深呼一口气.

sentences.en: Osmanthus blossoms give off [ exhale ] a rich perfume.
sentences.cn: 桂花 发出浓郁的芳香.

sentences.en: Take a deep breath, then exhale slowly.
sentences.cn: 深吸一口气，然后慢慢呼出。

sentences.en: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE as you inhale, and downward as you exhale.
sentences.cn: 女被访者起身时吸气, 下蹲时呼气.

trans.tran_en: to breathe air, smoke etc out of your mouth
to breathe air, smoke etc out of your mouth

trans.tran_cn: 发散出，放出，放射，使蒸发，[医]渗出
